name: google/gmail dropdown highlighting - ORANGE
description:
Taken from an existing, just changing color to ORANGE:  
http://userstyles.org/styles/64759/gmail-menu-and-auto-completion-highlighting
css:
@-moz-document domain("mail.google.com"), regexp("https://apis\\.google\.com/.*mail\.google\.com.*") {
/*
** Gmail menu and auto-completion highlighting
** v2.3
** http://userstyles.org/styles/64759/gmail-menu-and-auto-completion-highlighting
**
** .gssb_i
**   Gmail search auto-completion
** .J-N-JT
**   Gmail/Contacts/Tasks menu
**   Gmail:
**     message selection menu
**     "Move to" menu
**     "More" menu
**     settings menu (gear icon)
**     Inbox Type menu
**     label-list item settings menu
**     search/filter dialog menus
**     Composer format and "Check spelling" menus
**   Contacts:
**     contact selection menu
**     "More" menu
**     settings menu (gear icon)
**   Contact details pop-up "More" menu
** .J-LC-JT
**   Gmail "Label as" menu
**   Contacts "Groups" (assignment) menu
** .Jd-Je
**   Chat widget "Search people"
**   Gmail Composer To/Cc/Bcc auto-completion
** .uy
**   Chat widget "Set status here" menu
** .U5.acE .Jd-Je
**   Contacts search auto-completion
** .gbmt-hvr
**   Google Bar (top Google menu bar)
** .oB
**   Chat "Options" menu
** .a-w-ib
**   Chat contact "Show in chat list" menu (inside iframe document from apis.google.com)
*/
.gssb_i, .J-N-JT, .J-LC-JT, .Jd-Je, .uy, .U5.acE .Jd-Je, .gbmt-hvr, .oB, .a-w-ib {
    background-color: #FFA500 !important;
}
}
